languages.text: "Мое почтение, маршал. Адептус Арбитес славятся несгибаемой волей и чутьем на плетущиеся сети заговоров и махинаций. Надо признать, это бесценный навык для человека, которому уготована столь особая судьба". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Мое почтение, вице-маршал. Адептус Арбитес славны своей несгибаемой волей и особым чутьем на плетующиеся сети заговоров и махинаций. И надо признать, это бесценный навык для человека, которому уготована столь особая судьба". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

languages.text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мое почтение, маршал. Адептус Арбитес славятся несгибаемой волей и чутьем на плетущиеся сети заговоров и махинаций. Надо признать, это бесценный навык для человека, которому уготована столь особая судьба". {n}Кунрад тонко улыбается — то ли вам, то ли своим мыслям.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Salutations, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Kunrad smiles a thin smile — whether at you or at his own thoughts, there is no telling.{/n}

"Salutations, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Kunrad smiles a thin smile — whether at you or at his own thoughts, there is no telling.{/n}

This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Kunrad gives a thin smile — whether at you or at his own thoughts, there is no telling.{/n}

This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Kunrad gives a thin smile — whether at you or at his own thoughts, there is no telling.{/n}

This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

"My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

languages.text: 「よろしくお願いします、将帥。高等裁定局は、その不屈の意志と、陰謀や策謀の網を見抜く鋭い勘で名高いです。確かに、あなたのように特別な道を歩む者にとっては、これほど貴重な資質もないでしょう」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よろしくお願いします、将帥。高等裁定局は、その不屈の意志と、陰謀や策謀の網を見抜く鋭い勘で名高いです。確かに、あなたのように特別な道を歩む者にとっては、これほど貴重な資質もないでしょう」{n}ボイトヴィルはかすかに微笑んだが、それが自分に向けられたものなのか、あなたにはわからない。{/n}

languages.text: "Sehr erfreut, Marschall. Die Adeptus Arbites sind berühmt für ihren unbeugsamen Willen und den scharfen Instinkt, mit dem sie Verschwörungen und Intrigen aufdecken. Ohne Frage ein unschätzbar wertvolles Talent für jemanden wie Euch, dem ein solch besonderer Pfad vorbestimmt ist. {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sehr erfreut, Marschall. Die Adeptus Arbites sind berühmt für ihren unbeugsamen Willen und den scharfen Instinkt, mit dem sie Verschwörungen und Intrigen aufdecken. Ohne Frage ein unschätzbar wertvolles Talent für jemanden wie Euch, dem ein solch besonderer Pfad vorbestimmt ist. {n}Voigtvir lächelt schmal, aber du bist nicht sicher, ob es dir gilt.{/n}

languages.text: « Mes hommages, {mf|maréchal|maréchale}. Les membres de l'Adeptus Arbites sont réputés pour leur volonté de fer et leur instinct affûté qui leur permet de démêler complots et manigances. Il faut reconnaître qu'il s'agit là d'un talent inestimable pour une personne destinée à suivre une voie aussi particulière que la vôtre. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mes hommages, {mf|maréchal|maréchale}. Les membres de l'Adeptus Arbites sont réputés pour leur volonté de fer et leur instinct affûté qui leur permet de démêler complots et manigances. Il faut reconnaître qu'il s'agit là d'un talent inestimable pour une personne destinée à suivre une voie aussi particulière que la vôtre. » {n}Voigtvir esquisse un faible sourire, mais vous n'êtes pas {mf|sûr|sûre} qu'il vous est destiné.{/n}

languages.text: «Saludos, mariscal. El Adeptus Arbites es célebre por su indómita voluntad y su aguzado instinto para descubrir conspiraciones ocultas. Esta es sin duda una habilidad de valor incalculable para alguien destinado a un cometido tan especial como el suyo». {n}Voigtvir esboza una tenue sonrisa, pero no tienes claro que vaya dirigida a ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saludos, mariscal. El Adeptus Arbites es célebre por su indómita voluntad y su aguzado instinto para descubrir conspiraciones ocultas. Esta es sin duda una habilidad de valor incalculable para alguien destinado a un cometido tan especial como el suyo». {n}Voigtvir esboza una tenue sonrisa, pero no tienes claro que vaya dirigida a ti.{/n}

languages.text: “向您致意，元帅。帝国法务部的法务官素来拥有不屈不挠的意志与无比敏锐的直觉，擅长揭露隐藏的阴谋和诡计。不可否认，对于像您这种注定会踏上独一无二的道路的人而言，这是无比宝贵的技艺。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不确定他是不是在向你微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “向您致意，元帅。帝国法务部的法务官素来拥有不屈不挠的意志与无比敏锐的直觉，擅长揭露隐藏的阴谋和诡计。不可否认，对于像您这种注定会踏上独一无二的道路的人而言，这是无比宝贵的技艺。”{n}维特威尔微微一笑，但你不确定他是不是在向你微笑。{/n}

languages.text: "Saygılarımı sunarım Miralay. Adeptus Arbites, sarsılmaz iradesi ve gizli komple ve entrika ağlarını ortaya çıkarmaya yönelik keskin içgüdüleriyle ünlüdür. Kuşkusuz bu, kaderinde sizinki gibi özel bir yolda ilerlemek yazılı biri için paha biçilemez bir yetenektir." {n}Voigtvir belli belirsiz gülümsüyor ama kimi hedef alıyor emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "My regards, Marshal. The Adeptus Arbites are famous for their unbending will and keen instinct for uncovering hidden webs of conspiracy and scheming. This is admittedly a priceless skill for someone destined for a path as special as yours." {n}Voigtvir smiles faintly, but you are not sure it is directed at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Saygılarımı sunarım Miralay. Adeptus Arbites, sarsılmaz iradesi ve gizli komple ve entrika ağlarını ortaya çıkarmaya yönelik keskin içgüdüleriyle ünlüdür. Kuşkusuz bu, kaderinde sizinki gibi özel bir yolda ilerlemek yazılı biri için paha biçilemez bir yetenektir." {n}Voigtvir belli belirsiz gülümsüyor ama kimi hedef alıyor emin olamıyorsun.{/n}
